projects.title: Bipedal Robot (10× BLDC + ODrive)
projects.summary: Designed a 7 kg biped with GIM6010-8 actuators. Implemented torque control via ODrive and explored RL gait policies; added external bearing load-path to protect motors.

projects.title: TIW 1- Handheld Game Console
projects.summary: Built a DS inspired game console using a Raspberry Pi Zero and all in-house designed 3D printed parts.

projects.title: Ivy Technologies — Amazon Robotics Deployment
projects.summary: Led on-site wiring and commissioning of robotic arms; coordinated safety checks and throughput tests; delivered go-live under deadline.

projects.title: 2×4 Macropad · RP2040
projects.summary: Designed a Pico-based macropad with 3D-printed case using CircuitPython and wire matrix.
